title: Mailings are shown in activities stream when signed out
body_html: When a user is not logged in, the main landing page of the teams app shows the mailings which is.. well, not intended. Not a tragedy but definitely something that should be fixed, as the mails are NOT intended to be seen by anyone not from the orga team or intended recipients, and definitely not for anonymous / non-users.
body_text: When a user is not logged in, the main landing page of the teams app shows the mailings which is.. well, not intended. Not a tragedy but definitely something that should be fixed, as the mails are NOT intended to be seen by anyone not from the orga team or intended recipients, and definitely not for anonymous / non-users.
body:
When a user is not logged in, the main landing page of the teams app shows the mailings which is.. well, not intended. Not a tragedy but definitely something that should be fixed, as the mails are NOT intended to be seen by anyone not from the orga team or intended recipients, and definitely not for anonymous / non-users.

![screen shot 2015-06-05 at 17 31 45](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/3143348/8009446/12a1c2d4-0ba9-11e5-9e36-f1fb37946a76.png)
